Accessors

aliases

  • get aliases(): string[]
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:83

    Returns string[]

    list of aliases, like substitutions of name. parse(string) method uses this if the provided string doesn't match with the name.

Methods

add

  • add(interval: Interval): Interval
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:184
    example
    let _2M = Interval.parse('2M')
let _2m = Interval.parse('2m')

_2M.add(_2m) // 3m

    Parameters

    • interval: Interval

      Interval to add to current interval

    Returns Interval

    Returns string

traspose

  • traspose(note: Note): Note
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:169
    example
    let interval = Interval.parse('2M')
let note = Note.parse('C')

interval.traspose(note) // 'D'

    Parameters

    • note: Note

      note to apply the interval trasposition

    Returns Note

    the resulting note

Static fromGradesAndSemitones

  • fromGradesAndSemitones(grades: number, semitones: number): Interval
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:142
    description

    for correct Interval it is necesary provide both: grades and semitones.

    example
    let interval = Interval.fromGradesAndSemitones(3, 4)
interval // '3M'

interval = Interval.fromGradesAndSemitones(3, 3)
interval // '3m'

    Parameters

    • grades: number
    • semitones: number

    Returns Interval

Static of

  • of(noteA: Note, noteB: Note): Interval
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:125
    example
    let noteA = Note.parse('C')
let noteB = Note.parse('F')
Interval.of(noteA, noteB) // '4J'

    Parameters

    • noteA: Note

      First point of interval

    • noteB: Note

      Second point of interval

    Returns Interval

    the interval between both notes

Static parse

  • parse(intervalString: string): Interval
    • Defined in interval/interval.ts:99
    description

    try to parse the string to an interval instance

    Parameters

    • intervalString: string

      string representation of an interval

    Returns Interval

    the resulted Interval or undefined
